items.title: Trump faces fresh MAGA blowback for efforts to ‘de-escalate’ in Minnesota
items.description: The president’s response to widespread public dismay over the shooting death of another Minnesotan has put him in a bind with his own base.

items.title: Top Democratic groups urge party to shed soft-on-crime image, hire police
items.description: The Center for American Progress wants Democrats ‘on their front foot’ talking about crime, an issue where Republicans have long held the advantage.

items.title: FBI executes search warrant seeking ballots from Fulton County’s 2020 election
items.description: The FBI executed a search warrant in Fulton County, Georgia, for 2020 election ballots, as President Donald Trump seeks to find already debunked voter...

items.title: Rep. Ilhan Omar says ‘fear and intimidation doesn’t work on me’ after town hall attack
items.description: Omar said President Donald Trump’s rhetoric about her has increased the threats she faces.

items.title: VA leaders have barely acknowledged Alex Pretti’s death, workers say
items.description: Employees at the Minneapolis VA hospital were initially told they could not hold a memorial for Pretti, though that decision was later reversed.
